des: "I create this recipe for my birthday after receiving a bottle of Tito'sÂ® Vodka. It's like drinking liquid crystal. The sugar doesn't quite dissolve so at the bottom of your glass you get a little slurry of sugar and martini. It's the frosting on the cake! Slurp to your hearts content!"
ins: Pour sugar into the bottom of a martini glass; stir in lemon juice. Add pomegranate juice and vodka; stir well. Drop in ice cubes and garnish with lemon peel.
